caption:
“TMI, but I haven’t had an ingrown hair in months thanks to this exfoliating lotion. It makes my gams glisten, too. A singular lotion that does all of the treating, exfoliating, and moisturizing I need in one go seems difficult to find, but Drunk Elephant taught me that it’s not impossible.” 
 
Thank you @pissbowling for the love for T.L.C. Glycolic Body Lotion! Read the full feature on @instylemagazine via link in bio.
